name: Liberty Belle
description:
The sinister VICTOR LUDFANG has unleashed havoc across the United States! It's up to the heroic Liberty Belle to put a stop to his plans, in this bite-sized 3D Platformer adventure!

FEATURES
  • 9 Levels across 5 Worlds
  • 2 Epic Boss Fights
  • Short Playtime you can complete in one sitting.
